recipe_name: Courgette carpaccio with tomato, Kalamata olives and a lemon, mint and parsley dressing
author: Maria Elia
method: Lay the courgette ribbons onto two serving plates in a single layer.  Mix the rest of the ingredients together in a small bowl and drizzle over the courgette ribbons. Leave to marinate for ten minutes, then serve.
ingredients: 1 courgette, sliced into thin ribbons on a mandolin,  60g/2oz Kalamata olives, stones removed, chopped,  1 tomato, chopped,  Â½ lemon, zest and juice only,  1 small handful fresh mint, chopped,  1 small handful fresh parsley, chopped,  2 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
